column5: I have a customer looking for a spotter,the event is in two weeks. call Darryl @ 905-342-5786 if your interested
I have other plans this year or I would be on this fast ,but for anyone that can do this,you will learn a TON,and have a great time to boot.
How does this work? What is required of me as a "spotter"?

You have to be at the captains meeting Friday night at the bluffs then you get your name pulled to see what boat you will be with on Saturday which starts 5AM then you go out and watch them fish to make sure they go by the rules and when you come in you have to stay with the fish till they get weighed in it is a good time
Bro you going? I tried to call.   Rob you will have a great time.
Ya this year i am fishing it with team Tightline
Guess I,ll see ya Sunday then.Dont forget to bring beer.  Good luck Bro.Theres a 50 out there with your name on it.
Sounds interesting. I'll have to see what arrangements I can make. I'm cool bringing my camera?
Yep,I clicked away. I reported last year after my day out.
